channel.title: Comments on: Differences between Oracle and SQL Server when working with NULL and blank values
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.description: Awesome post! May seem small but that is a major difference and requires a lot of different thinking both when storing data and writing code against it.
item.content:encoded: Awesome post! May seem small but that is a major difference and requires a lot of different thinking both when storing data and writing code against it.
